    • Method Detail

      • getSearchedData

        public java.lang.String getSearchedData(java.lang.String keyword)
        This function scrapes data for the keyword entered. Keeps a record of the keyword in history
        Parameters:
        keyword - The keyword entered by the user
        Returns:
        The scraped data

      • getRefinedData

        public java.lang.String getRefinedData(java.lang.String consoleText,
                                       java.lang.String keyword)
        This method refines the scraped data. Displays only the items whose title contains the searched keyword . Updates all other tabs
        Parameters:
        consoleText - All scraped data for the keyword
        keyword - The keyword entered by the user
        Returns:
        The refined data

      • getLastSearched

        public java.lang.String getLastSearched()
        This method reverts search result to the previous search. Shows empty Text Console if there is no previous searches
        Returns:
        The last searched keyword

      • closeSearch

        public java.lang.String closeSearch(java.lang.String keyword)
        This method clears the current search record. Initializes all other tabs to their initial state. Keeps track of the record which was cleared so that it can be retrieved upon clicking Last Searched.
        Parameters:
        keyword - The keyword entered by the user
        Returns:
        Returns empty string. This will be displayed in the Text Area.
